Class Chat

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.models.Chat
public class Chat extends Object
Represents a chat between two users (buyer and seller). A chat contains multiple messages exchanged between the two users.

  • Constructor Details

    • Chat

      public Chat(int idRequest, int idUserSeller, int idUserBuyer)
      Constructs a new Chat instance.
      Parameters:
      idRequest - The ID of the related request.
      idUserSeller - The ID of the seller involved in the chat.
      idUserBuyer - The ID of the buyer involved in the chat.
